definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Moreover, it offers the expressiveness which helps to “simplify complex tasks”.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它更具表现力，这有助于“简化复杂任务”。

sentences.english: To express sadness and anxiety, the zither and the flute are the two most effective instruments.
sentences.chinese: 对于悲愁来说，以琴箫两种乐器最有表现力。

sentences.english: The intonation was exemplary and there was life and intensity in the musical expression.
sentences.chinese: 他们的音准堪称模范，音乐的表现力丰富而有生命。

sentences.english: Excellent, modest and expressive use of colors. That’s effective.
sentences.chinese: 运用卓越，适中和富有表现力的颜色，那样就很高效。

sentences.english: The first movement, although expressive, maintains a lightness in thesound.
sentences.chinese: 第一乐章，富有表现力的同时又不失轻盈。

sentences.english: So closures in C# are awesome, and expressive and great.
sentences.chinese: 所以闭包在c#中是可怕的，富于表现力的和伟大的。

sentences.english: Nicknaming is an expressive technique of art in the literary creation.
sentences.chinese: 绰号是文学创作中一种富有表现力的艺术手法。

sentences.english: The main trade-off here is in expressiveness vs. simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 在这里主要的优劣在于富于表现力和简单性的比较。

sentences.english: This picture scroll fluent, exquisitely clever lines accurate, full of expression.
sentences.chinese: 这幅长卷线条准确流畅，工细灵动，充满表现力。

sentences.english: Hammer Head: Made of Germany-made felt, it has pure, beautiful tone and strong expressive force.
sentences.chinese: 采用德国制造的呢毡，音色纯正优美，表现力强。

sentences.english: In advertising, we attach more importance to the performance of the text.
sentences.chinese: 在广告方面，宣美更注重文案的表现力。

sentences.english: However, exercise is far from dancing for it's in lack of smooth moving and emotional expression_r_r.
sentences.chinese: 可是，广播体操不像跳舞那末运动自若富有表现力。

sentences.english: Space and shape similar to the proportion of once close to, its expression significantly weaker Dayton.
sentences.chinese: 空间与形态的比例一旦接近相仿，其表现力顿显疲软。

sentences.english: We explored the expressiveness of the white block and its abstract personality.
sentences.chinese: 建筑师探讨了白色体块的表现力和建筑的抽象特征。

sentences.english: I find that the expressions make a much bolder statement when rendered in B&W.
sentences.chinese: 我发现这样拍的表情更具表现力。

sentences.english: Here's an exercise to help you use your body expressively.
sentences.chinese: 这儿有一个练习帮助你使用你的身体的表现力。

definition: training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
